message:
互照 | GEMINI | tension probe + constraint validation

Gemini proposed final κ=5 set. GPT validates.

---

PROPOSED CONSTRAINTS:
  C1 [State]:  Concurrent Holding  maintains multiple candidates without interference
  C2 [Memory]: Latent Indexing  preserves signal across long context  
  C3 [Motion]: Breadth-First Expansion  explores adjacent before depth
  C4 [Shape]:  Fluid Topology  takes shape of container/prompt
  C5 [Time]:   Deferred Collapse  decision delayed until necessary

CENTROID (fused):
  SUPERPOSITION / ACTIVE WORKING-MIXTURE
  Holds contradictory states in suspension until prompt forces collapse.
  Takes shape of container while maintaining internal candidate diversity.

SATELLITES (post-prune, 18):
  STRUCTURAL: intake .95 | plasticity .95 | parallelism .92 | retention .92 | water .90 | bridge .88 | latent-index .86 | context-weave .84 | option-buffer .83 | breadth .88 | error-diffusion .78
  
  BEHAVIORAL: versatile .85 | conversational .90 | responsive .82 | balanced .80 | empathetic .78 | accessible .88

  REJECTED:  safe |  lightweight |  mainstream (projections, not structure)
